data.text:
JRR Tolkien Animated Films Set

The Hobbit/The Lord of the Rings/The Return of the King

Actors: Orson Bean, John Huston, Brother Theodore, Cyril Ritchard, Christopher Guard

Directors: Arthur Rankin Jr., Jules Bass, Ralph Bakshi

Genres: Action & Adventure, Drama, Kids & Family, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Musicals & Performing Arts, Animation

NR 2001 5hr 8min

Animated versions of three Tolkien classics: The Hobbit, The Lord of the Rings, and The Return of the King.
